directions: Rub eggplant with 2 tablespoons oil and bake, cut sides down, in a small baking pan in middle of oven until flesh is browned and very tender, about 50 minutes.
Scoop flesh from eggplant into a food processor, discarding skin, and purée with olives, capers, remaining 2 tablespoons oil, and salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: 1 (1-pound) eggplant, halved lengthwise and flesh scored in a crosshatch pattern
1/4 cup Kalamata or other brine-cured black olives, rinsed, patted dry, and pitted
title: Olive and Eggplant Spread
